q: Simon Cowell may court Paula Abdul for X Factor panel Simon Cowell wants his new Fox talent series The X Factor to include controversy, vocal groups and, maybe, Paula Abdul on the judging panel. We've spoken to her, she knows I'm a big fan, Simon Cowell said of his former fellow American Idol judge. "I've always said at some point we are going to be working together." Rep. Mike Pence , R-Ind., answers questions as he meets with constituents during a town hall meeting in Pendleton, Ind., on Friday. Mike Pence announced Thursday that he will not seek the presidency in 2012. Whether that's continuing to serve in Congress or coming home and running for governor, we're just going to take a hard look to see where we can make the most difference for the values we believe, he said.
